snippet: With the job of justice being an elective position, the question is how can a state justice steer clear of politics.
lead_paragraph: With the job of justice being an elective position, the question is how can a state justice steer clear of politics.

headline.seo: Texas Supreme Court Justices Must Face Pull of Politics
headline.main: State’s Justices Forced to Face Pull of Politics
headline.print_headline: State’s Justices Forced to Face Pull of Politics
